interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: OKAY | Black Jamaican Castor Oil Conditioner | For All Hair Types & Textures | Revive - Moisturize - Grow Healthy Hair | with Argan Oil & Shea Butter | Free Of Parabens, Silicones, Sulfates | 12 Oz
Review Date: 2019/01/26
Store: Okay
Product Description: ['Stronger richer fuller hair growth needs to be properly conditioned to prevent breakage and stimulate growth. Moisture Growth Conditioner with Black Jamaican Castor Oil and Argan Oil will help hair become comparably softer and detangles brittle hair with rich hydrating ingredients. This conditioner should be used every day after shampooing. This is the 2nd step which provides conditioning therapy to help revive brittle hair.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Okay', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.25 x 8 x 2.25 inches; 12.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': '810367016336', 'UPC': '810367016336', 'Manufacturer': 'Derby International LLC, dba KANAR', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Domestic Shipping': 'Item can be shipped within U.S.', 'International Shipping': 'This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.  Learn More'}
Review Text: I have dry hair due to washing in warm water. This conditioner adds glossiness without weight
Review Title: richly scented and no artificial dye
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

delicate scent
CAFE AU LAIT Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap
Primal Elements
["Rich, creamy coffee aroma blended with real coffee grinds to remove cooking odors from busy chef's hands. HIGHLY MOISTURIZING - Glycerin is a humectant, attracting moisture and draws it deep into your skin to keep it hydrated. With over 25% glycerin in our soap, our soap moisturizes the skin with a rich lather that rinses cleanly away leaving the skin silky smooth. GREAT FOR FACE & BODY – When used as a face wash, glycerin soap will remove the excess oil from the skin to unclog pores. Unlike regular soaps, which dry out the skin and make it feel tight and flaky, our glycerin soaps keep the skin hydrated after use. HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS – Paraben Free, Cruelty Free and Vegan. Made in California, USA. GREAT FOR GIFTS - Each 5.8 oz. bar is shrink-wrapped and great for gift giving."]
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Primal Elements', 'Scent': 'Coffee', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.99 x 0.51 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SWCAFE', 'UPC': '640986102925'}
Had bad experiences with glycerin soap in the past so was wary when trying this brand. However texture and fragrance exceeded expectations. Even though cupcake part falls out easily ... cant wait to try other "flavors"
delicious scent and gentle enough for face

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor health-conscious personal care products, now showing particular interest in formulations that cater to hair care needs, specifically those utilizing natural ingredients to promote moisture and growth.

- **Quality Over Cost:** They maintain a strong emphasis on quality over cost, selecting superior, non-toxic, and eco-friendly hair care options that reflect their commitment to sustainability and wellness.

- **Scent and Performance:** The user prefers products that not only provide effective results but also offer enjoyable textures and pleasant scents. They appreciate conditioners that enhance hair glossiness without adding weight, aligning with their overall beauty experience.

- **Comparison Habits:** Their shopping behavior remains discerning, as they thoroughly compare products to ensure a balance between quality and price, indicating thoughtful purchasing practices across personal care categories.

- **Environmental/Health Consideration:** The user remains devoted to avoiding synthetic and toxic ingredients, consistent with their values of health and environmental responsibility in personal care selections.

- **Makeup and Hair Care Awareness:** Their recent interactions highlight an increasing focus on hair care products that emphasize ingredient quality, showcasing a broader commitment to greener options that prioritize performance, gentleness, and overall health.

Overall, the user embodies a dedication to gentle, effective personal care products that cater to both skin and hair needs while continuing to emphasize eco-friendly formulations and informed purchasing practices.
